*div1 type="summary"* *p*Peter Ellis Bean to Austin, March 5, 1828. Warning Austin of the plans of a band of outlaws.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-05-1828">March the 5th 1828*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p*Dier Sir*/p*
*p*this is a copey of a leter that I have Just Racivd from a *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned* of mine that Dont wish his name statid and by this you can see what is on foot By his letter—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Coln Bean*/person_mentioned* Sir after my Respects to you as a friend I feel it my Duty as a *person_mentioned*Cityson */person_mentioned*of this Goverment to let you now as you are the nearest ofiser to this Piase the Prosedings of a *person_mentioned*band of men*/person_mentioned* that has Past this Piase a few Days agow they call them selves *person_mentioned*ad vans guard of a large army of Republicans*/person_mentioned*, But if I should name them I should call them a *person_mentioned*Band of Robers*/person_mentioned* thare is onley fifteen strong at Present and they git no *person_mentioned*Recruts */person_mentioned*hear in this *location_mentioned*Cuntrey */location_mentioned*but they say they have two or three hundrid *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*hourly Expected my informasion is from the noted *person_mentioned*Doctor Daton*/person_mentioned* who seems to head the Party he told me that he intendid to fall on *location_mentioned*Sn Antonio*/location_mentioned* first if he should git men enough but if he should fail he intended to take *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dilions [De Leon's]*/person_mentioned* fort */location_mentioned*firs and was varry sertin that *location_mentioned*Dewits Coloney*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Austins*/location_mentioned* would Join him he also states that the *person_mentioned*Peopel on *location_mentioned*Ish bayo*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*those near *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* are to keep up a constant alarm in order to Draw the *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*to that Piase, he says thare is fifty *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*on the way to meet him at the*location_mentioned* mouth of Poorwashitau*/location_mentioned* the truth of this you must now for he says that *person_mentioned*Baley Anderson */person_mentioned*and a young man by the name of *person_mentioned*Blunt*/person_mentioned* is in Company with them I also saw a leter from one *person_mentioned*Capt frith*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Prater */person_mentioned*stated that they ware much in favour of the Plan and that *person_mentioned*Mr Prater*/person_mentioned* would use all his influans with the Ingins he Names a*person_mentioned* Mr Litten*/person_mentioned* who is to Join him on the *location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned*with a *person_mentioned*company of men*/person_mentioned* he say that they are to Join under the name of traping Expadision as to other Particulars you can inquire of *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* who will give you this letter—*/p*
*p*this is Sir atrew Copey of the original that is in my Posasion I also have informasion that thare is a man by the name of *person_mentioned*Capt Hall */person_mentioned*in your *location_mentioned*Colloney */location_mentioned*that is to Join with his *person_mentioned*companey */person_mentioned*this you will find out for I Dont now this *person_mentioned*Mr Hall*/person_mentioned* this is all that I have to state to you But I hope your Pudans [prudence ?] will inform your self and then Do what you may think Best and let me now*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Peter E Bean */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*P.D.*/p*
*p*this came from *location_mentioned*Pocan pint [Pecan Point]*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
